solution_line_template: First find the number of boats eaten by fish: {total_boats} boats * {eaten_percent}% = <<{total_boats}*{eaten_percent}*{percent_factor}={boats_eaten_by_fish}>>{boats_eaten_by_fish} boats

Then subtract the two groups of boats that were destroyed from the original number to find the number left: {total_boats} boats - {boats_eaten_by_fish} boats - {shot_boats} boats = <<{total_boats}-{boats_eaten_by_fish}-{shot_boats}={boats_left}>>{boats_left} boats
